turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order me a coffee from starbucks for pickup

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which locatio would you like to order from

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order from the Starbucks on Madison Ave in charmichael california

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what time would you want to pick it up

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need it in about 20 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what would you like me to order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a caramel macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need it to be a grande size

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Non fat please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you also have them add an extra bit of caramel on the bottom

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like any food items to go with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so I'm ordering a caramel macchiato with non fat milk extra caramel and whipped cream right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is ordered at the maddison avenue location in charmichael and should be ready for pickup in about 20 minutes. I'm sending the receipt to you phone now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks
